pages.text: A bit more work and about as much of precious gold, and you can reforge mundane iron ring into much shinier and fancier form.<br2/>The only notable property of this accessory, apart from being all shiny and golden, is that it has effect on Piglins similar to wearing gold armor - they will respect you a bit more when seeing this
preciousness on your finger, and won't try to kill as soon as you enter their field of view.
